#summary &boxvr; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxvr;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxVR;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2560/index.htm U+02560].
  * `&boxVr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/255f/index.htm U+0255F].
  * `&boxvR;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/255e/index.htm U+0255E].
  * `&boxvr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/251c/index.htm U+0251C].
